title: Dishonored - Definitive Edition
summary: Experience the definitive Dishonored collection. This complete compilation includes Dishonored as well as all of its additional content - Dunwall City Trials, The Knife of Dunwall, The Brigmore Witches and Void Walkerâ€™s Arsenal.

title: Eximius: Seize the Frontline
summary: EXIMIUS is a FPS/RTS hybrid that focuses on squad-based combat. The game features an intense 5v5 multiplayer experience with each team comprising of 4 Squad Officers and one Commander.
